mapper.select: SELECT RNUM AS seq, USER_ID AS userId, NTC_TTL AS ntcTtl, NTC_INQ_CNT AS ntcInqCnt, NTC_WRT_DATE AS ntcWrtDate FROM( SELECT NTC_NO, NTC_TTL, NTC_INQ_CNT, NTC_WRT_DATE, NTC_PRY, USER_ID, FROM( SELECT n.NTC_NO, n.NTC_TTL, n.NTC_INQ_CNT, n.NTC_WRT_DATE, n.NTC_PRY, u.USER_ID FROM NOTICE n, USERS u WHERE n.user_no = u.user_no ORDER BY n.ntc_pry ) WHERE ROWNUM <=#{endRowNo} ) WHERE rnum >=#{startRowNo}
